policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:FaultLevel>
            <L7p:LevelInfo soapFaultLevel="included">
                <L7p:Level intValue="4"/>
            </L7p:LevelInfo>
        </L7p:FaultLevel>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAucGFyYW1ldGVycy52YWx1ZX0="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="valueToStore"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0LnVybC5wYXRofQ=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="urlPath"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:ContentType stringValue="text/xml; charset=utf-8"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="storageCodes"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${urlPath}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="/kv/store"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="/kv/store"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="Path is ${urlPath} - storing the value "${valueToStore}" in KV."/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:KeyValueStorage>
                    <L7p:ContinueOnError booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Key stringValue="cob"/>
                    <L7p:MaxAge stringValue="10m"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="valueToStore"/>
                    <L7p:StoreId stringValue="redis"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:KeyValueStorage>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="Value "${valueToStore}" stored in KV."/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2NvZGVzL2NvZGVbQGlkPSR7a3ZzdG9yYWdlLmFzc2VydGlvbi5zdGF0dXN9XS90ZXh0KCk="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="xPath"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="kvResponse"/>
                    <L7p:XmlMsgSrc stringValue="storageCodes"/>
                    <L7p:XpathExpression xpathExpressionValue="included">
                        <L7p:Expression stringValue="${xPath}"/>
                        <L7p:Namespaces mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="s"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Namespaces>
                        <L7p:XpathVersion xpathVersion="XPATH_1_0"/>
                    </L7p:XpathExpression>
                </L7p:ResponseXpathAssertion>
                <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="U3RvcmFnZSBzdGF0dXM6ICR7a3ZzdG9yYWdlLmFzc2VydGlvbi5zdGF0dXN9IC0gJHtrdlJlc3BvbnNlLnJlc3VsdH0KCg=="/>
                </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${urlPath}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="/kv/read"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="/kv/read"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="Path is ${urlPath} - reading the value from KV."/>
                    <L7p:LoggingOnly booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:KeyValueLookup>
                    <L7p:Key stringValue="cob"/>
                    <L7p:StoreId stringValue="redis"/>
                </L7p:KeyValueLookup>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
